alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ITAWAMBA AND NORTHEASTERN MONROE COUNTIES THROUGH 100 PM CST... At 1230 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Smithville, or 10 miles northeast of Amory, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Smithville, Tremont, New Salem, Clay, Eastman, Cardsville, Turon, Tilden, Bounds Crossroads, Jacinto, Parham, and Cadamy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
